title.rendered: Consultation Technical Workshop on the Report with Recommendations for Revision of the National Higher Educational Program and Curriculum for the Veterinary Surgeons Profession

content.rendered:
Successfully, conducted the “Consultation Technical Workshop on the Report with Recommendations for Revision of the National Higher Educational Program and Curriculum for the Veterinary Surgeons Profession”!
 
This workshop, part of the “Support to Recognition of Professional Qualifications” project, brought together key participants from the Ministry of Education, Science, Technology, and Innovation (MESTI), the State Council for the Regulated Professions (SCRP), the Faculty for Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine, the Food and Veterinary Agency, the Veterinary Chamber, and other relevant stakeholders.
 
The focus was on presenting and discussing the EU legal context, evaluating the current curriculum, and providing recommendations for skills, knowledge, and competencies needed for veterinary surgeons. 
 
There were exchanged of knowledge and insights, ensuring that the education and training of veterinary surgeons meet the highest standards and respond to current needs with the perspective of Recognition of Professional Qualifications.
 
European Union in Kosovo
Ministria e Arsimit, Shkencës, Teknologjisë dhe Inovacionit
WEglobal
